description.english: Use the "Cloud" Power-Up in a Special Stage in the Wales Rally GB
description.german: Setze das Power-Up "Cloud" in einer Special Stage in der "Wales Rally GB" ein.
description.french: Utiliser le bonus "Cloud" 3 fois au cours d'un Special Stage du Wales Rally GB.
description.italian: Usa il Potenziamento "Cloud" in una Special Stage del Wales Rally GB
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador "Cloud" en una Special Stage del Wales Rally GB.

description.english: Use the "Flatout" Power-Up 3 times in the same race
description.german: Setze das Power-Up "Flatout" in einem einzelnen Rennen drei Mal ein.
description.french: Utiliser le bonus "Flatout" 3 fois au cours d'une même course.
description.italian: Usa il Potenziamento "Flatout" per 3 volte nella stessa gara
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador "Flatout" 3 veces en una carrera.

description.english: Use the "Horn Power" Power-Up 3 times in the same race
description.german: Setze das Power-Up "Horn Power" in einem einzelnen Rennen drei Mal ein.
description.french: Utiliser le bonus "Horn Power" 3 fois dans une même course.
description.italian: Usa il Potenziamento "Horn Power" per 3 volte nella stessa gara
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador "Horn Power" 3 veces en una carrera.

description.english: Use the "Extreme Pace" Power-Up 10 times in total
description.german: Setze das Power-Up "Extreme Pace" insgesamt zehn Mal ein.
description.italian: Usa il Potenziamento "Extreme Pace" per 10 volte in totale
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador "Extreme Pace" 10 veces en total.

description.english: Use the "Thunder Bolt" Power-Up 10 times in total
description.german: Setze das Power-Up "Thunder Bolt" insgesamt zehn Mal ein.
description.italian: Usa il Potenziamento "Thunder Bolt" per 10 volte in totale
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador "Thunder Bolt" 10 veces en total.

description.english: Use the "Hailstorm" Power-Up 10 times in total
description.german: Setze das Power-Up "Hailstorm" insgesamt zehn Mal ein.
description.italian: Usa il Potenziamento "Hailstorm" per 10 volte in totale
description.spanish: Usa el potenciador "Hailstorm" 10 veces en total.

description.english: Win a Special Stage in Single Player mode
description.german: Gewinne eine Special Stage im Einzelspielermodus.
description.french: Remporter un Special Stage en mode solo.
description.italian: Vinci una Special Stage nella modalità Giocatore Singolo
description.spanish: Gana una Special Stage en el modo Un jugador.

description.english: Win all the gold medals in the "Vodafone Rally de Portugal"
description.german: Gewinne alle Goldmedaillen in der "Vodafone Rally de Portugal".
description.french: Remporter toutes les médailles d'or dans le Vodafone Rally de Portugal.
description.italian: Vinci tutte le medaglie d'oro del "Vodafone Rally de Portugal"
description.spanish: Gana todas las medallas de oro del "Vodafone Rally de Portugal".

description.english: Win all the gold medals in the "Rallye de France - Alsace"
description.german: Gewinne alle Goldmedaillen in der "Rallye de France - Alsace".
description.french: Remporter toutes les médailles d'or dans le Rallye de France - Alsace.
description.italian: Vinci tutte le medaglie d'oro del "Rallye de France - Alsace"
description.spanish: Gana todas las medallas de oro del "Rallye de France - Alsace".

description.english: Win all the gold medals in the "Rally Guanajuato Mexico"
description.german: Gewinne alle Goldmedaillen in der "Rally Guanajuato Mexico".
description.french: Remporter toutes les médailles d'or dans le Rally Guanajuato Mexico.
description.italian: Vinci tutte le medaglie d'oro del "Rally Guanajuato Mexico"
description.spanish: Gana todas las medallas de oro del "Rally Guanajuato México".

description.english: Reach a total of 45 minutes of racing in valid Online games
description.german: Fahre insgesamt 45 Minuten in gültigen Online-Spielen.
description.french: Atteindre un total de 45 minutes de course dans une partie en ligne.
description.italian: Raggiungi 45 minuti di gara totali in partite Online valide
description.spanish: Compite durante 45 minutos en partidas online válidas.

description.english: Complete the Single Player mode to 100% and win the final cup!
description.german: Schließe den Einzelspielermodus zu 100% ab und gewinne den letzten Pokal!
description.french: Terminer le mode Solo à 100 % et remporter la coupe ultime !
description.italian: Completa al 100% la modalità Giocatore Singolo e vinci la coppa finale!
description.spanish: ¡Termina el 100% del modo Un jugador y gana la última copa!
